scripts.autocommit: chokidar '**/*' -i 'node_modules/**' -i '.git/**' -i '*.log' -i 'package-lock.json' -c "git add -A && git commit -m 'WIP auto-commit' || true"
scripts.autocommit:push: chokidar '**/*' -i 'node_modules/**' -i '.git/**' -i '*.log' -i 'package-lock.json' -c "git add -A && git commit -m 'WIP auto-commit' || true && git push origin master || true"
